name: rememberme
description: Extension for Meteor account-base package with the implementation of rememberMe
author: Tomasz Przytu≈Ça <t.przytula.dev@gmail.com>

scripts.test: npm run eslint-check && npm run test:headless
scripts.test:headless: cross-env BABEL_ENV=COVERAGE TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=chrome COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_OUT_LCOVONLY=1 COVERAGE_OUT_HTML=1 COVERAGE_OUT_TEXT_SUMMARY=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=$PWD/ meteor test --once --driver-package meteortesting:mocha
scripts.test:watch: cross-env WATCH=1 BABEL_ENV=COVERAGE TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=chrome meteor test --driver-package meteortesting:mocha
scripts.test:e2e: cd test/e2e && meteor npm install && meteor npm test
